mapper.select: SELECT ID,TITLE,DESCRIPTION, PUBLISHED, DELETE_YN, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_TIME FROM TB_TUTORIAL WHERE DELETE_YN='N' AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
SELECT ID,TITLE,DESCRIPTION, PUBLISHED, DELETE_YN, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_TIME FROM TB_TUTORIAL WHERE DELETE_YN='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TUTORIAL( ID,TITLE,DESCRIPTION, PUBLISHED, INSERT_TIME )VALUES ( SQ_TUTORIAL.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{description}, 'Y', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TUTORIAL SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', DELETE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
